author: Confucius
message: Being in humaneness is good. If we select other goodness and thus are far apart from humaneness, how can we be the wise?
title: Thought of the day

author: Byron Pulsifer
message: To give hope to someone occurs when you teach them how to use the tools to do it for themselves.
title: Thought of the day

author: Lucille Ball
message: Id rather regret the things that I have done than the things that I have not done.
title: Thought of the day

author: Eckhart Tolle
message: The past has no power to stop you from being present now. Only your grievance about the past can do that.
title: Thought of the day
